messages.subject: IDEA
messages.msgSnippet: Michelle, I am a wealth of information about the IDEA program, I m from Alaska. My sister just disenrolled from it and I think you will find it very difficult
messages.messageBody:
Michelle,
I am a wealth of information about the IDEA program, I'm from Alaska.
My sister just disenrolled from it and I think you will find it very
difficult to unschool and use their program.
Please email me offline and I'll put you in touch with her.
She went with a different program this year that was less invasive, but she
is going independant next year and with great conviction about it.
Get some more information before you sign on....it's not what you think.
Some things aren't worth the money.

Ren
